abstract: "Jeopardy!" champ Joon Pahk is back to his old puzzle tricks.
snippet: "Jeopardy!" champ Joon Pahk is back to his old puzzle tricks.
lead_paragraph: SATURDAY'S PUZZLE - So by now we all know that Joon Pahk ripped through Jeopardy!, won an ungodly amount of (pre-tax) money, qualified for the Tournament of Champions, and generally made us all proud, yes? Good, because today he's back as a constructor with a tough but ultimately fair and fun puzzle that contains quite a few interesting consecutive-consonant and unique entries. Notice that I didn't say crunchy. You're welcome.
